subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The right-handed reliever Joe Nelson signed a one-year, $1.3 million contract with the American League champion Tampa Bay Rays. The 34-year-old Nelson was 3-1 with one save in 59 appearances for the Florida Marlins last season. His 2.00 earned run average was third best among National League relievers behind Hong-Chih Kuo’s 1.69 and Brad Lidge’s 1.95.
